title: As a guy, what are good ways to learn how to make a woman laugh? - Quora

response.answer_text: Make a joke about something personal to her, like her culture, language, etc, so long it is in good taste to both of you.  For example jokes I found funniest that I've heard from my friends/boyfriend were ones about my Russian background (think kgb, putin, etc).  This shows that they find my culture, and hence me, interesting, which is much appreciated.
